s: I normally use a different brand ... this brand. I was super surprised to see that amazon sells it. Very happy with the colour match and it works in my existing epoxy gun. ... M. Stockdale ... The color (Glacier White) was a perfect match for my 2005 Corian solid surface counter top which came apart at a seam when moving it and the sinks to replace the kitchen cabinets with new ones. The adhesive was easy to use and the seam is invisible! I would recommend you also use Artisan's mixing dispenser ...
